org.corfudb.runtime.clients

Interface IClientRouter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NettyClientRouter

    public interface IClientRouter
    This is an interface in which all client routers must implement. Client routers are classes which talk to server routers. Clients are registered on client routers using the addClient() interface, and can be retrieved using the getClient() inteface.

    Created by mwei on 12/13/15.

    • Method Detail

      • addClient

        IClientRouter addClient(IClient client)
        Add a new client to the router.
        Parameters:
        client - The client to add to the router.
        Returns:
        This IClientRouter, to support chaining and the builder pattern.

      • getClient

        <T extends IClient> T getClient(Class<T> clientType)
        Gets a client that matches a particular type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the client to match.
        Parameters:
        clientType - The class of the client to match.
        Returns:
        The first client that matches that type.
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - If there are no clients matching that type.

      • sendMessageAndGetCompletable

        <T> CompletableFuture<T> sendMessageAndGetCompletable(io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                                                      CorfuMsg message)
        Send a message and get a completable future to be fulfilled by the reply.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of completable to return.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The channel handler context to send the message under.
        message - The message to send.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will be fulfilled by the reply, or a timeout in the case there is no response.

      • sendMessageAndGetCompletable

        default <T> CompletableFuture<T> sendMessageAndGetCompletable(CorfuMsg message)
        Send a message using the router channel handler and get a completable future to be fulfilled by the reply.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of completable to return.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send.
        Returns:
        A completable future which will be fulfilled by the reply, or a timeout in the case there is no response.

        Parameters:

        message - The message to send.

                          CorfuMsg inMsg,

        Parameters:
        ctx - Channel handler context to use.
        inMsg - Incoming message to respond to.
        outMsg - Outgoing message.
